import re

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\d', '', text)
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\s', '', text)
    return text

import re

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    text = re.sub('[aeiouAEIOU]', 'MUTATED', text)
    text = re.sub('\\d', '', text)
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\s', '', text)
    return text
